entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Port Perry
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:02 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning early this morning and ending near noon then 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h then west 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2. POP 60%
